pullrequest.title: changing from gettimeofday to clock_gettime in common::Time class.  Added nanosleep in World::Step, improved cpu load during pause.

content.raw:
Looks good to me.  I have a few comments, but none of them are urgent or necessary.

In the long term, we should consider removing the `timeval`-based methods if possible, leaving just the `timespec`-based ones.  There's a lot of room for error in maintaining both sets of methods.
content.html:
Looks good to me. I have a few comments, but none of them are urgent or necessary.

In the long term, we should consider removing the timeval-based methods if possible, leaving just the timespec-based ones. There's a lot of room for error in maintaining both sets of methods.
